info.title: Claims APIs
info.description:
This API enables seamless access to comprehensive details about provider firms, their offices, associated users, and internal user.
Provider Firm Overview
  • High-level information about the provider firm.
  • Details about all offices linked to the provider firm.
  • Information on users and fee earners associated with the provider firm.
Provider Office Details

Key information about individual offices, including:

  • Bank account details.
  • Contract and schedule details.
  • NMS authorizations.
  • Users associated with each office.
Provider User Details

Granular information about individual users, including:

  • User roles.
  • Associations with provider offices.
Useful Links
  • Runbook
  • Slack Channel
  • Grafana Dashboards
  • Github Source Code

This service is under active development and is deployed frequently.
While we strive not to change endpoint contracts, we may deprecate existing endpoints and introduce new ones. Please check the Swagger page regularly for up-to-date information.
